mil7.3.4:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘salakalyanikaya ekam angam gahetabban’ti yam vadesi, katamam tam ekam angam gahetabban”ti?
mil7.3.4:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, salakalyanika nama antopathaviyamyeva abhivaddhati hatthasatampi bhiyyopi;
mil7.3.4:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena cattari samannaphalani catasso patisambhida chalabhinnayo kevalanca samanadhammam sunnagareyeva paripurayitabbam.
mil7.3.4:1.4: Idam, maharaja, salakalyanikaya ekam angam gahetabbam.
